        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_DEFAULT, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_BREAK, LITERAL_CONTINUE, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_THROW, LITERAL_ASSERT, LITERAL_LAMBDA, SEMI, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, VARIABLE_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, LABELED_STAT, CASE_GROUP, EXPRESSION, FOR_INIT, FOR_ITERATOR, RESOURCE_SPECIFICATION, SWITCH_BLOCK_STATEMENT_GROUP, ENHANCED_FOR, ANNOTATION_DEF, ANNOTATION_FIELD_DEF, ANNOTATION_MEMBER_VALUE_PAIR, ANNOTATION, TYPE, CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, PACKAGE_DEF, IMPORT, STATIC_IMPORT, ENUM_DEF, RECORD_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
